title: Pork Medallions with Peanut Sauce with Yummi Nuts Chile Toreado y Limón
ingredients: 2 pounds ribbon tenderloin cut into medallions
1 bag of Yummi nuts Chile Toreado
1 bag of Yummi Nuts with Lemon
instructions: Step 1: Mix all the ingredients except the oil in a bowl and spread the medallions.
Step 2: Heat the oil, lower the heat and fry the pieces until golden brown on both sides.
Step 1: Crush the peanuts in a processor until it is practically powder, leave a little half crushed aside.

Step 2: In a pot, heat the oil and fry the garlic and onion until the onion is transparent. Add the peanut butter, then the cream, a little salt and pepper, and the paprika. Stir constantly and keep the heat low.
Step 3: Add the ground peanuts and continue stirring until thickened.
Step 4: Pour the sauce over the pork medallions and sprinkle the rest of the peanuts on top.
